rows.label: qst610503_msg0001
rows.name:
Were you quite all right? We received a
troubling report from the Invidian army,
so I was a little worried.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0003
rows.name:
A mercenary band desperate for
spoils had moved to secure the Divine Beast
weapons despite official warnings.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0004
rows.name:
The Invidians assured us they did not 
desire war and that we were free to use
any means necessary to stop the band.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0005
rows.name:
Those tricksy Invidians... They basically
shifted responsibility to us, whether the
mercenaries succeed or fail.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0006
rows.name:
At any rate, how did things go with
Irving? Was he causing any trouble?

rows.label: qst610503_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, it sounds like he actually
managed to make himself useful!
That's excellent news.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm sorry to have troubled you all
over this, but I hope this affair has
helped Irving to turn over a new leaf.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0009
rows.name: Thank you all so very much.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0101
rows.name:
You should find Irving guarding the
Divine Beast Weapon Dig Site in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst610503_msg0102
rows.name:
Could you go and make sure he's
carrying out his assigned mission
this time?
